overview:
Kurt F. Wedel is currently the VP of Sales and Operations at First To File, having previously served as the VP of Sales at Attributor. Prior to Attributor, Kurt was the SVP of Global Sales at MarkMonitor, where he drove the company from its inception to being the largest online brand protection company, with over half of the Fortune 100 as customers. Wedel brings to FTF a unique combination of experience with Internet content monitoring, advertising, B2B and SaaS services. Prior to MarkMonitor, Kurt held senior sales and marketing management positions at RealNames, Netscape Communications, Inc., Sybase Inc. and Oracle Corporation.

Kurt received his undergraduate degree from Vassar College and his masters from J. L. Kellogg Graduate School of Management at Northwestern University.
